objects.specification: A smooth wooden floor surface with a natural earthy brown tone and a slightly reflective finish, designed to evoke a warm and inviting classroom atmosphere.
A smooth indoor wall painted in a neutral light gray color with a matte finish, providing a clean backdrop for classroom elements.

A robust wooden teacher's desk with a rectangular tabletop and sturdy legs, featuring a rich brown finish and subtle dinosaur-themed green trim along the edges. It has ample surface area for teaching materials and an open shelf underneath for storage.

A large dinosaur-themed blackboard/whiteboard fusion panel with a dark green writing surface framed by a wooden border featuring carved dinosaur silhouettes. The board has a matte black side for chalk use and a glossy white side for markers.

A sleek ceiling-mounted projector with a compact white housing, ventilation grills on the sides, a front-facing lens, and unobtrusive mounting brackets. The design is minimalist and blends seamlessly with the ceiling.

A standard student desk made of light wood with a rectangular top and slim metal legs, featuring a smooth surface and visible natural grain. The edges are accented in subtle orange to echo the dinosaur theme.

A life-size dinosaur skeleton model mounted on a discreet metal stand, with off-white textured bones arranged in a dynamic, lifelike pose. Each bone is intricately detailed with weathered shading to simulate authentic fossil appearance.

A tall wooden bookshelf with five evenly spaced shelves, finished in dark brown with visible wood grain. It is stocked with a variety of dinosaur-related books, whose colorful spines add visual interest.

A vibrant dinosaur poster printed on glossy paper, featuring colorful illustrations of a Tyrannosaurus rex in its natural habitat. The image is framed by a thin wooden border painted in bright orange.

A vibrant dinosaur poster printed on glossy paper, featuring colorful illustrations of a Triceratops grazing among ferns. The image is framed by a thin wooden border painted in bright orange.
A vibrant dinosaur poster printed on glossy paper, featuring colorful illustrations of a Stegosaurus by a watering hole. The image is framed by a thin wooden border painted in bright orange.
A vibrant dinosaur poster printed on glossy paper, featuring colorful illustrations of a Velociraptor in mid-stance. The image is framed by a thin wooden border painted in bright orange.
An educational chart printed on matte paper illustrating dinosaur anatomy and dietary habits, using bold color-coded sections, clear labels, and simple diagrams, framed in orange.

A large educational mural depicting a prehistoric landscape with dinosaurs roaming among ferns and volcanoes. The colors are earthy greens, browns, and oranges with a matte painted finish.

A round analog wall clock with a white face, black numerals, and simple black hands. It has a slim white plastic frame and offers clear, easy-to-read time display.
